attributes.action: every car driver has to undertake a retest every 5 years across the board for all ages, people are killed and thousands are injured in Road traffic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: every car driver has to undertake a retest every 5 years across the board for all ages, people are killed and thousands are injured in Road traffic accidents, 99.9% and retesting bad driving and dangerous driving,some car driver lane swapping every few minutes, make our roads safer, should you be in need of further training or found to be unfit to drive through health issues  medical issues should be restricted and requirements by the examiner,driving should be  pleasure,every want safer roads,this would be an ideal solution.
